comment: If you have the option to take him for any class, make him your first pick. He is amazing at breaking down structural analysis in a very simple way without making you feel stupid. His math is always on point, and he really is enthusiastic about teaching anything structural. I wish I would have been able to take him for statics AND strength of mats.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: He learns your name and uses it throughout the class. He was super helpful and was very very good at explaining the material. Talks fast but is not hard to understand. Great guy and very personable.
Tests are hard! Nice guy but not with the red pen. WOULDN'T suggest taking him if there are other professors available. Too fast. His grading scale is fair.

I liked this professor. Very engaging in class. He learns everyone's name and uses them! Homework was required and graded. Test and quizzes were straight from homework - no surprises. I actually learned the material presented. Talks fast!

Dr. Barham is an excellent professor. He is the definition of a GOOD TEACHER. He explains ideas and concepts well. He is very kind, helpful, patient, enthusiastic and has a sense of humor. His class is not easy but you are guarantee to learn. If you do the HW you'll pass the class. I will most definitely take him again.

Great Professor. Tests are hard as nails. Very Helpful. Needs to slow down in his teaching methods, and the rate of speaking. Would NOT take him again, because TOO MUCH of Barham is NOT good for my Health. There are limited number of professor to choose from when taking higher CE classes, so that is why I took this professor for this course.

This Professor is AWESOME!! he is extremely clear in his lectures and very helpful. I loved his class, never had any problems. Never needed to read the book, everything is understood in his lecture. Would recommend him if your a civil engineer

Very good professor and a good class layout. took him over the summer and was basically walked through the entire course. attendance is a must, he takes off for days missed. HW must be done. Quizzes dont count for much. Take the lab along with the lecture so things make more sense. Highly Recommended to take him for this class or any other class.

Prof Barham is an excellent instructor!  Strengths is a difficult and complex subject, very dry but he does a great job of helping students understand the subject.  He uses many examples and the tests are similar to the suggested homework he assigns.  Do the homework and you should get a B.  Understand the homework and notes and you'll get an A.

Dr. Barham is a great professor. He knows what he is talking about and will go out of his way to help you understand the material. His exams can be difficult but if you study the lecture notes and do the recommended problems (all of them) you should be fine.
Fantastic professor. Really knows his stuff and tries really hard to make sure everyone understands. It is a hard class but as long as you keep up with the homework and study you should do fine.

Excellent instructor who wants to help students learn. The quizzes are mostly from the assigned homework. The tests can be difficult if you don't know the material so study the chapter examples and review the homework and class notes. If you get an A in this class then you should be prepared for the next level of engineering.
Singularly one of the best professors I've ever had. Really knows the topic and how to impart that knowledge. Serious but affable. I'd take Barham for any and every class he might teach.
Dr. Barham is one of the best professors at SPSU.  He is extremely difficult, but really knows his stuff and cares about students.  His grading scale is great too 90-100A 75-89B, and 65-75 is a C.
Excellent professor, tough but knows his stuff. Helpful, lots of homework. Tough tests, grades fairly, best prof at this school.
Great Prof. He takes the time to really explain the material. He goes fast at times, but he has no problem going back and explaining.
Great teacher. Knows what he is teaching and very helpful one one one.
His home works and tests are hard as hell!

Great teacher, if you go to class and pay attention you can't go wrong.  He expects a lot, but breaks things down so that everyone can understand.  He makes the course seem hard in the beginning but it's not.  I would defiantly recommend him, and I would take him again for any other required class if he teaches them.
Great teacher. Goes a little fast. Class based on his lecture notes but book examples are useful. Test  questions are exactly as he describes in class, not tricky.
Great lecturer. Stays on topic. Can be a little fast at times. Fair when it comes to exams and homework.
Good teacher to take if you can.
